course.title: PSY 5104 Integration Seminar in Program Evaluation (3 units)
course.desc: Integration of program evaluation practice, research and theory leading to a written report related to advances in program evaluation practice and theory.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: EDU 5299 or PSY 7103 or CRM 6359; EDU 6299; PSY 7102. Courses PSY 5104, EDU 5504 cannot be combined for units.
